Mass of earth is 5.97 × 1024 kg and mass of moon is 7.35 × 1022 kg. What is the
total mass?
Total mass = 5.97 × 1024 kg + 7.35 × 1022 kg.
= 5.97 × 100 × 1022 + 7.35 × 1022
=597 × 1022 + 7.35 × 1022
= (597 + 7.35) × 1022
= 604.35 × 1022 kg.
